data.md:MetaData: N of LHF-1, Plume mapping and sampling, MAPR attached

Mid-Atlantic Expedition 2005, Cruise No. 64, Leg 2, Longterm study of hydrothermalism and biology at the Logatchev field, Mid-Atlantic Ridge at 14°45' N (revisit 2005, HYDROMAR II), 6 May - 6 June 2005, Fortaleza (Brazil) - Dakar (Senegal)
